oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Sagebrush Roundup - 1939-mm-dd - Part 4
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: WMMN's Sagebrush Roundup radio program, part 4. Featuring the Hickory Nuts (Jimmy James, Mary Ann Estes, Enoch 'Eli' Haney), Salt & Peanuts (Frank Salt, Margaret McConnell, Buddy Frank), the Boys From Kentucky (Curley Wellman, Bob Shortridge, Charlie 'Big Foot' Keaton), Buddy & Smiley (Buddy Starcher, Smiley Sutter), Ted Grant, and unidentified performers 'Pete' and 'Noel'.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Hickory Nuts; Ted Grant; Boys From Kentucky; Enoch 'Eli' Haney; Buddy & Smiley
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: MC introduces the Hickory Nuts -- My Pony Boy / The Old Gray Mare (medley) (Hickory Nuts) -- MC introduces Ted Grant -- [Hungarian folk song] (Ted Grant) -- MC introduces the Boys From Kentucky -- A Summer Night's Rain (Boys From Kentucky) -- MC introduces Enoch 'Eli' Haney -- Baby Your Mother (Like She Babied You) (Enoch 'Eli' Haney) -- MC introduces Buddy & Smiley -- Riding Down That Old Texas Trail (Buddy & Smiley) -- Kelpamall Tablets commercial -- MC closing statement -- Theme (Gonna Raise A Ruckus Tonight) -- Announcer closing statement
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WMMN (Radio station : Fairmont, W. Va.); Sagebrush roundup (Radio program); Hickory Nuts (Musical group); James, Jimmy, 1912-; Starcher, Mary Ann Estes; Haney, Enoch; Salt & Peanuts (Musical group); Kurtz, Frank; McConnell, Margaret (Musical group : Salt & Peanuts); Frank, Buddy; Boys From Kentucky (Musical group); Wellman, Curley; Shortridge, Bob; Keaton, Charlie Big Foot; Buddy & Smiley (Musical group); Starcher, Buddy, 1906-2001; Sutter, Smilie, 1915-; Grant, Ted (Violinist)
